name: cvm-cw-types
description: Composable VM CosmWasm types and client

scripts.build-xc-core: cosmwasm-ts-codegen generate --plugin client --schema ./schema --no-bundle --out dist/cw-xc-core/ --name cw-xc-core && cp --recursive schema/* dist/cw-xc-core/
scripts.build-cw-xc-executor: cosmwasm-ts-codegen generate --plugin client --schema ./schema --no-bundle --out dist/cw-xc-executor/ --name cw-xc-executor && cp --recursive schema/* dist/cw-xc-executor/
scripts.build-cw-mantis-order: cosmwasm-ts-codegen generate --plugin client --schema ./schema --no-bundle --out ./dist/cw-mantis-order --name cw-mantis-order && cp --recursive schema/* dist/cw-mantis-order/
